#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
int main()
{
	int t,len,i,j,count;
	char a[1001],x[][5]={" ", " ", "ABC","DEF","GHI","JKL","MNO","PQRS","TUV","WXYZ"};
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",&a[0]);
		len=strlen(a);
		count=0;
		for(i=0; i<len; i++)
		{
			if(a[i]=='#')
				continue;
			if(a[i]==a[i+1])
				count++;
			else
			{
				j=a[i]-'0';
				printf("%c",x[j][count]);
				count=0;
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
